description:
Version 1.7 (Current Release) - October 21, 2025

- Switched to 'Gemini 2.5 Flash Image' for reliable image generation, ensuring application stability and performance.

---

Version 1.6 - October 20, 2025

- Attempted upgrade to Gemini 3 Pro (reverted due to lack of native image generation support).

---

Version 1.5 - October 19, 2025

- Replaced specific 'Personas' with generic female and male body types for a streamlined experience.

---

Version 1.4 - October 19, 2025

- Added a version history modal to track application updates.

---

Version 1.3

- Integrated a reusable header with zGenMedia app cross-promotion.
- Added a reusable, branded footer with social and contact information.
- Adjusted ad banner placement for better layout flow.

---

Version 1.2

- Implemented a modular ad system.
- Added top and bottom leaderboard ad banners to the main layout.

---

Version 1.1

- Initial public release of Group Photo Fusion.
- Core features include multi-subject photo merging, custom backgrounds, various scenarios/poses, and multiple quality settings.
